name: Winged Bull

trait.name: Charge
text: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 (3d12) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

description:
Archons always ride into battle on fearsome winged mounts. Some legends suggest that the mount is actually a physical manifestation of the archon's will, allowing the pair to act with a single mind. The two most common archon mounts are winged bulls and winged lions.
Source: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 214
